name: ATV Quad Power Racing 2
synopsis: ATV: Quad Power Racing 2 is all about big tricks, big boots to the face, and big finishes.  As ten of the top pro riders in the world with real-life sponsors, you can race in 15 massive tracks and two freestyle arenas full of fast, edge-of-your-seat gameplay.  Fight your way to the finish with kick attacks, huge jumps, and power slides.  Get ready for this arcade-style ATV racer.
